Description:

In the distant mountains of Colorado, the horrors happening in 
the hospital Mount Massive. The establishment was abandoned 
long ago, but recently restored under the program "Research and 
charity" Transnational corporations Murkoff. Until now, all in a clinic 
held in complete secrecy ... 

Acting on a tip from an internal source, independent journalist Miles 
Apshur penetrates the hospital. What he finds there - over the edge 
of science and religion, nature and something completely different. 
Once inside, Miles hopes only for one thing - to shed light on all the 
horrifying truth hidden in the heart of Mount Massive.
